frlearn.utils.np_utils.div_or¶

frlearn.utils.np_utils.div_or(x, y, fallback=nan)[source]¶

Divides x by y, replacing np.nan values with fallback.

Parameters
xndarray

Dividend.

yndarray

Divisor.

fallbacknumerical, default=np.nan

Fallback value to substitute for np.nan after division.

Returns
zndarray

Quotient.
